title: Hillary Clinton was appointed to replace the U.S. Senator?
subtitle: Reports that Hillary Clinton will fill an open seat in the U.S. Senate in New York have been evacuated by a senator who resigned after being accused of fraud are false news.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: :: Hillary Clinton was named to fill the open seat of the United States Senate in New York, which was vacated by a senator who resigned after being accused of fraud.
